Dec 14, 2017 - ONE of the CBD's most colourful characters has died before the house he shared with his wife could be renovated. Actor, teacher and war veteran George Dixon lived in an 1850s shop and home in 330 King St that was in danger of falling down due to major structural faults. In July, Mr Dixon eloquently ...
